snippet.title: Budget Cuts Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Budget Cuts is coming May 31st!

In my channel update this month I mentioned working on the release trailer for the Virtual Reality game Budget Cuts - it's been an incredible amount of work, but it's finally done - and the game is releasing in just a few days! So exciting!

I hope you enjoy the trailer and if you have a HTC Vive or Oculus Rift, do get the game - it's a lot of fun!

You are an employee at mega conglomerate TransCorp to stamp papers and file files! Unfortunately TransCorp is an expert in the business of manufacturing cost-cutting robots, and soon your job will be in danger. 

As another one of your coworkers is being dragged off to the terrifying HR department, a mysterious package arrives at your cubicle. Will you be able to save your job?

Get Budget Cuts on steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/400940/Budget_Cuts/

--

Leave me a comment, or find me elsewhere:
Second channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQQrDvTfWOmFFycbhMpjypw
Twitch: http://twitch.tv/slicedlime
